post_message: “What’s happening to America?” said David Wilcox, as he showed his wounds inflicted by the mob. “You’re supposed to be able to vote in peace! It’s supposed to be part of our democracy. And what happened is, I vote for somebody, and I get beaten, robbed, and my car stolen, and I have no way of getting my wife to and from work safe anymore,” he told the Chicago Tribune’s news crew.

"We have a problem in this country. It's called Muslims," a man said at a Donald J. Trump rally. Trump did not appear to correct the man when he alleged that President Barack Obama is Muslim and also not an American. @webpagelink
